players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob's death is a tragedy. As the only kill, it suggests the mafia is trying to blend in. We should look for who is acting out of character or pushing a weak narrative."
You: "Charlie, interesting that you're already analyzing the mafia's strategy so confidently. I investigated you last night and discovered you're the mafioso. Diana, we need to vote Charlie out."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of a more suspicious target? Your claim seems rushed and opportunistic."
Diana: "Alice, if you're truly the detective, why reveal your investigation result so early instead of gathering more info? This feels like a mafia play to eliminate a town member quickly."

You: "Diana, I revealed early because with only 3 players left, waiting means risking Charlie manipulating you against me. I'm the real detective - Charlie killed Bob and is now trying to discredit my investigation through you."
Charlie: "Alice, if you were the detective, why investigate me first night instead of someone more suspicious? You're fabricating this to eliminate me and win with Diana as your mafia partner."

You: "Alice, if you were the detective, why investigate me first night instead of someone more suspicious? You're fabricating this to eliminate me and win with Diana as your mafia partner."

Alice was arrested
